Vuex-ORM Apollo Plugin

Vue + Vuex-ORM + GraphQL = <3

Get Started â†’

GraphQL

This Vuex-ORM plugin uses the apollo-client to let you sync your Vuex-ORM state with a GraphQL API

Vuex-ORM

The plugin keeps up with the API and design of Vuex-ORM with full reactivity.

No boilerplate

Setup and usage of this plugin is kept as simple as possible, no clutter in your components.
